mainContent.paragraph: Work on yourself for 42 days and find your path to the future!

features.title: What awaits you?
features.paragraph: Learn the basics of programming from professionals in 42 days through interactive learning!

full.title: Cross-learning opportunity
full.description: Learn the basics of programming in three directions in 42 days

backend.title: Backend Basics
backend.description: Get acquainted with the basics of Backend

frontend.title: Frontend Basics
frontend.description: Get acquainted with the basics of Frontend

mobile.title: Mobile Development Basics
mobile.description: Get acquainted with the basics of mobile development

features.subParagraph: After 42 days, you will get acquainted with the basics of programming and will be able to choose one of three directions!

statistics.title: Until now
statistics.paragraph: Our goal is to help students become professional specialists in the IT field.

students.title: Our students
students.paragraph: Find out what our students say and see their results.

student1.name: Shukhrat Mirrakhimov
student1.comment: I am delighted to announce that I will be joining TopTal as a Back-end Engineering Intern. I would like to thank my recruiter Silvana Palacios and Azimjon Pulatov for supporting me through the whole process...

student2.name: Mirvohid Azimov
student2.comment: I'm starting a new position as a Software Engineer Intern at Yandex! Also, my special thanks to Azimjon Pulatov and all YBKY team members for creating a pleasant community to enjoy coding!

student3.name: Begnazar Akhmadjonov
student3.comment: I am thrilled to announce that I have embarked on a new journey as a Student Developer at Ericsson. Additionally, I am immensely grateful to Azimjon Pulatov and Mukhammadyusuf S. for providing me with...

student4.name: Javokhirbek Khaydaraliev
student4.comment: I'm so excited to announce that I will be joining the Google Assistant team at Google Zürich as a STEP Intern this summer. I have always been so curious about working at Google and now I am super excited

faq.title: Did we interest you?
faq.paragraph: Start learning programming with professionals with international experience!
